quotes: You're my today and all of my tomorrows 💘
I thank the stars every day for you 🌟
Being yours is my favorite blessing 💍
My heart belongs to you now and forever 💖
Every moment with you is a treasure I cherish 🎁
You make my heart skip a beat every time I see you 💓
Loving you is the easiest thing I've ever done 🌈
You're the missing piece I never knew I needed 🧩
My love for you grows stronger with each passing day 🌻
You're the dream I never want to wake up from 🌙
